pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ talasattikaṃ uggiranti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.6: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhākaṃ talasattikaṃ uggirantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ talasattikaṃ uggirissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.9: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ talasattikaṃ uggirathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ talasattikaṃ uggirissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.15: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggireyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.1.10: kāyaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ vā antamaso uppalapattampi uccāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.4: Anupasampannassa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggirati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
